content:
MobileListItem Class

In this Article

Represents an individual item within a List or SelectionList ASP.NET mobile control. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(false)]
[System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")]
[System.Web.UI.MobileControls.PersistName("Item")]
public class MobileListItem : System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TemplateContainer, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Control
  • MobileControl
  • Panel
  • System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TemplateContainer
  • MobileListItem

Remarks

Although the class name is MobileListItem, the element name is Item. On a mobile page, you declare an item by using the <Item>element.

Constructors summary

MobileListItem()

Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
MobileListItem(String)

Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class using the specified stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class with the specified Type. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
MobileListItem(Object,String,String)

Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

Properties summary

DataItem

Gets or sets the data item to which the list item is bound. This property is available only on a request where the list item is data-bound; on subsequent postbacks, it is always null. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
Index

Gets the index for an item within a list. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
IsTrackingViewState

Gets a value indicating whether the list item control is tracking changes to its view state. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
Selected

Gets or sets whether the list item is selected in its parent SelectionList object. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
Text

Gets or sets the text contained in the item. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.
Value

Gets or sets the value contained in the list item. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public MobileListItem ();

    Remarks

    This constructor builds a MobileListItem object with the missing elements set to null. The default constructor initializes all properties to null.

  • MobileListItem(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class using the specified stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text* property. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    • text

    Remarks

    Initializes a new instance of the MobileListItem class. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public MobileListItem (object dataItem, string text, string value);

    Parameters

    • dataItem
      Object

      Initializes stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.DataItem*.

    • text
      String

      Initializes stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text*.

    • value
      String

      Initializes stem.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Value*.

    Remarks

    This constructor builds a MobileListItem object with the missing elements set to null. The object is initialized with the DataItem, Text, and Value properties set to the values of the corresponding dataItem, text, and value parameters.

Properties

  • DataItem

    Gets or sets the data item to which the list item is bound. This property is available only on a request where the list item is data-bound; on subsequent postbacks, it is always null. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public object DataItem { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      The object to which the MobileListItem is bound.

  • Index

    Gets the index for an item within a list. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public int Index { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The position of the item within the containing list.

  • IsTrackingViewState

    Gets a value indicating whether the list item control is tracking changes to its view state. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    protected bool IsTrackingViewState { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the list item is tracking changes to its view state; otherwise, false.

  • Selected

    Gets or sets whether the list item is selected in its parent SelectionList object. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public bool Selected { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the item is selected in its parent SelectionList; otherwise, false.

  • Text

    Gets or sets the text contained in the item. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public string Text { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The text in the item. The default is an empty string ("").

    Remarks

    If the Text property is an empty string or is never set, either programmatically or through the constructor, it returns the value of the Value property for the specified list item.

    The Text property can be specified by using the Text attribute, or as inner text. If the Text property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. However, if the Text property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.

  • Value

    Gets or sets the value contained in the list item. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the www.asp.net/mobile Web site.

    public string Value { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The value contained in the list item. The default is null.

    Remarks

    If this property is null, a call to retrieve the value returns the value of the Text property.
